Title: Relates to allowing public welfare officials to withhold payment of rent to landlords who owe delinquent tax liabilities
Summary: Relates to allowing public welfare officials to withhold payment of rent to landlords who owe delinquent tax liabilities to local municipalities, school districts or counties.
LawCode: Amd ยง143-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing public welfare officials to withhold payment of rent to landlords who owe delinquent tax liabilities to local municipalities, school districts or counties
